alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 630 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Homestead General Airport. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homestead, Homestead Miami Speedway, Homestead General Airport, The Redland, Florida City, Homestead Base, Naranja, Princeton, Richmond West, Royal Palm Ranger, Leisure City, Cutler Bay, Zoo Miami, Goulds, West Perrine, Palmetto Bay, Inlikita, South Miami Heights and Palmetto Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
